name: RageBall
description: RageBall is modern take on a classic game retro style game. A dynamic arcade game with fast paced gameplay and engaging mechanics. RageBall is a 2d animation sports game, that pits player against player. Can you overcome the Rage?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 Storage: 3 GB available space
